ch.epfl.lis.wingj

Class WJImagesMask

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.epfl.lis.wingj.WJImagesMask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class WJImagesMask
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener
    Shows an ImagePlus and provides the tools to draw a mask.
    Version:
    June 16, 2011
    Author:
    Thomas Schaffter (thomas.schff...@gmail.com), Ricard Delgado-Gonzalo (ricard.delg...@gmail.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void applyMask(ij.ImagePlus imgToMask)
      Sets all pixel outside of the user-defined roi to black.
      static ij.ImagePlus createCircularBinaryMask(int widthInPx)
      Creates a circular mask (disc is made of elements 1, outside 0).
      void initializeRoi()
      Initializes the mask with no ROI at all.

      Returns true if the selected mask is valid (area is non-null).
